itunes:summary:
Comedian and host of the LongDays podcast Yannis Pappas comes by to talk about the Greeks being an underrated oppressed people, being shadowbanned (and outright suspended) on social media platforms, Mr. Hands style torture in the ancient world, and people basically getting themselves high off of information.
